InsideOutQuizUI Hello blank fragment
What do You do when You get a bad note at School? I take it as a challenge and try again I get angry I cry I satrt thinking you are not good enaugh
How do You act when your favourite football team scores? I get so happy I\'ll jump I start breaking averything inside the room I turn worried that the opponents could score back No reaction
How do You behave when You don\'t like a dish? I throw the plate trhough the whall I start thinking about how can it be patched I start mugging I get scared about getting sick
You Are Rage!> You Are Happyness! You Are Sadness! You Are Fear! You Are Disgust!
